name: I Want Out
description:
You're comfy, the window let's in plenty of sunlight and the sill where you sit is quite warm, but your owner is  out and the quiet is driving you up a wall but there on the other side of the room is an open window, perhaps a change of scenery will cure the boredom.

How to play:
You play as a Cat with a desire to go outside, you can't jump all that high due to your age but you still have some mobility and plenty of energy to get you to that open window, it's not much of a puzzle but it requires enough effort all the same.

Controls:
W or Up Arrow to interact
A/D or Left/Right Arrows to move
Space to jump

Furthermore:
This was made for Whisker Games' Whisker Jam 2022, the optional theme was "No Way Back" with the optional rule of having a feline be involved, originally I wanted to make it more puzzle themed but I figured I hadn't made a bare bones game intentionally for a while and this seemed like a fun way to do so, despite it being as bare bones as it is I gave it as much care and love as I would any other game that I make.
